name: 3.8.2 - Proportion of population with large household expenditures on health (greater than 25%) as a share of total household expenditure or income (%) - SH_XPD_EARN25
datasetName: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - United Nations (2022-04)

source.additionalInfo:
